transcript:
Customer: [Music]
Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan sir good afternoon.
Executive: Kaise hain sir boliye.
Customer: Achcha hai.
Executive: Sir keh raha tha ki wo aapko batana tha ki kaise use karna hai wo seller panel ko to do minute ke liye video meet par aa sakte hain kya?
Customer: Video mein main abhi bahar mein mandi mein hai thoda busy hai.
Executive: Achcha kab tak sir kab tak free honge aap?
Customer: Kal sir sham ko karo main line ko aaya na sham ko.
Executive: Achcha achcha achcha sir kab karu kal kal kitne baje karu?
Customer: 5 baje 6 baje.
Executive: Theek hai kal karta hu theek hai sir.
Customer: Kya kya hona kya hona.
Executive: Sir usme aapko sir batana hai ki kaise aapko pura go through karana hai ki kis kis type ka kya kya use hai aur kaise aap use karke filtration karke sahi buylead consume karoge aur kaise kaise IndiaMART aapko business deta hai teen char tarike se deta hai jaise ha.
Customer: Wo sabhi mere ko malum samajh pade hai wo main che saal se use karta hu lekin GST laga nahi.
Executive: Achcha achcha achcha ha wo sabhi wo option wo sabhi features to mere ko malum hai na.
Executive: Sir kuch kuch naye types aaye hue hain na to unka batana tha.
Executive: Jaise usme ek alert ka option hai catalog views ka hai to ye sab naye naye sir add hue hain to wo sir sara batana hoga.
Customer: Haan wo main main dekha hai wo kaisa use karna hai dekhte hain bhai.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Achcha achcha sir wo koi mushkil nahi hai wo aasan hai na.
Executive: Sir par do minute ke liye aa jate to main aapko bata deta kal hi bataunga aaj ke liye nahi bol raha hu main aaj to aap busy ho aur sir kuch jaise aapse baat hui thi to aap bol rahe the ki aise aise buylead aa rahi thi to abhi use kar rahe hain ki nahi kar rahe abhi aap?
Customer: Abhi use kar raha IndiaMART.
Executive: Haan haan use kar rahe hain matlab ki.
Customer: [inaudible] main use karta hu.
Executive: Buylead wagera abhi aap haan haan boliye sir.
Customer: [inaudible] abhi tak nahi hua deal deal wo nahi hua wo 15 main lead consume kare.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Ek bhi nahi deal ho jata ji.
Executive: Achcha achcha wo sample bhejo wo sample bhejna ko idhar bill likhna wo do kilo teen kilo ka bill nikal wo Bihar wala Punjab wala.
Executive: Samajh gaya do kilo teen kilo wala aa raha hai na sir aur aapko bulk me karna hai agar bahar karoge to bulk me karoge right?
Customer: Theek hai wo nahi wo bulk wala bhi sample bhejo karke bolta hai sample.
Executive: Achcha sample ka bhej raha hai.
Customer: Haan bhejo pehle wo bhejo wo bhejna ko usme jyada bolte rate wo unhone nahi bolte customer.
Executive: Sir ek bar aap pehle kar liya kariye na confirm ki ye mera rate hai agar aapko lag raha hai tabhi main sample bhejunga aisa karke.
Executive: Ye baat kar liya kariye unse pehle.
Customer: Wo aisa main bolta hu wo sample bhejo pehle wo seedha nahi aata aa jata wo wo tumhara mal tumhara paas koi hai wo bhejo main dekhenge dekhne ka baad tumko order de do.
Executive: Achcha aisa karke bolte hain to kya sir aap chhod ke offline me bhi aisa hi hota hai kya ki pehle sample lete hain fir uske baad paise ki baat hoti hai.
Executive: Aisa hi hota hai ki.
Customer: Offline me aisa nahi hamara dukan rehta na hamara dukan ko unho aa jata hai.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Offline ko unho aa jata hai uska samne aankho ka samne dikhta rehta na.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Wo dekh dekh ke kitna hona kitna rate me hona ha wo theek hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Deal ho jata hai.
Executive: Achcha aise hota hai.
Customer: Ye paise ka mamla hai na wo jyada paise wo 10 bore bhi 60 one lakh ho jata hai ye mal ek kya hai ki wo achcha mal hum photo bechte wo customer bejo pura bechte main bura mal beja hai to usko nasht ho jata na.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Uska malum hai wo aisa ho jata hai uske liye wo sample bhejo pehle.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Nahi to main aa jata hu udhar aisa kahta hai.
Executive: Theek hai.
Executive: Achcha aise karke bol raha hai ki pehle sample bhejo fir uske baad hi kuch aage ka deal karenge aisa karke hai na sir jitna bhi online wale me ho raha hai yahi ho raha hai aapke sath.
Executive: Sir ek sath puri buylead aap consume kar le rahe ho ki kuch matlab ki kuch kuch time par kar rahe ho matlab ek sath jaise ki aapko kal mili hogi na leads mili hogi aapko sari 10 mili hogi hai na 10 mili hogi aur aaj ek mili hogi 11 leads total mili hogi na sir.
Customer: Oh 11 mein aisa wo teen number aisa kam karte nahi recharge hum karna karte bolta.
Executive: Sir main bata raha hu dekhiye suniye main keh raha hu na ki jaise aapko 10 lead milti hai na to us 10 lead ko ek sath aap consume mat kariye usko time time par consume kariye samajh rahe hain ki aapko jo dikhega jo genuine lag raha hai theek hai fir usko kariye ek sath aap karoge na to do din char din panch din purane customer bhi aapko dikhenge to isiliye main bol raha tha sir ki ek bar aap aa jaoge na to main ek bar go through kara dunga ki kaise aapko consume karna hai buylead matlab kaise aap filtration kar sakte ho ki genuine buyer aa sake aapke paas sir ye bahut zaruri hai ek direction bahut zaruri hai sir to kal sir main aapse request kar raha hu ki 5 6 baje jab bhi aap free hoge main aapko us time kar lunga aur just char panch minute ke bas rahega sir main aapko bata dunga ki kaise aapko properly kaise use karna hai theek hai sir.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai theek hai theek hai sir wo abhi to thoda idhar idhar mal leke aaya wo karne ka usme bijli me tension hai.
Executive: Haan haan theek hai theek hai abhi aap busy ho kab kab free kab hoge kal kal free hoge.
Customer: Haan kal 5 5 baje 6 baje ko.
Executive: Theek hai kal main 5 baje aapko ek bar call kar lunga agar aap us time free hoge to us time kar lenge warna jis time aap bataoge us time kar lenge theek hai sir.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai okay sir thank you sir thank you so much ha.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is facing issues with buyleads.

- Customer wants to know about GST.

- Customer receives sample requests with high rates.

- Customer is unable to consume buyleads properly.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to explain seller panel usage.

- Executive will call back to explain buylead consumption.

- Executive will explain filtration process for genuine buyers.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back tomorrow at 5 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, seller panel, samples
